message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, but I'm open to negotiation.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I propose a 60/40 split for me instead. Time to even the scales. What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 for you is still too much. Let's split it 54/46,  taking inflation into account.  This is my final offer.
